props.format: Defines the format of a time displayed in picker. Available options are `ampm` and `24hr`.
props.allowedHours: Restricts which hours can be selected
props.allowedMinutes: Restricts which minutes can be selected
props.allowedSeconds: Restricts which seconds can be selected
props.scrollable: Allows changing hour/minute with mouse scroll
props.useSeconds: Toggles the use of seconds in picker
props.ampmInTitle: Place AM/PM switch in title, not near the clock.

slots.default: Displayed below the clock, can be used for example for adding action button (`OK` and `Cancel`)

events.click:hour: Emitted when user selects the hour
events.click:minute: Emitted when user selects the minute
events.click:second: Emitted when user selects the second
events.change: Emitted when the time selection is done (when user changes the minute for HH:MM picker and the second for HH:MM:SS picker
events.update:period: Emitted when user clicks the AM/PM button
